about.title: About Us
about.mainDescription: Our technology company builds on more than 20 years of experience of a team of professionals in the manufacturing and supply of industrial robotic technologies. Although we are a new player in the market, we benefit from the rich knowledge and innovative approaches we have gained through dozens of projects across various industries. Thanks to this experience, collaboration with leading experts, and access to the latest technologies, we bring solutions to the market that meet the highest quality standards.

roboticWelding.title: Robotic Welding Stations
roboticWelding.description: We offer standardized and custom solutions for all types of welding, including MIG/MAG, TIG, and laser technologies. Our workstations are designed for maximum efficiency and precision.

roboticGrinding.title: Robotic Grinding and Surface Analysis
roboticGrinding.description: We develop cutting-edge solutions for robotic grinding with integration of advanced post-processing, surface scanning, and subsequent processing.

laserCleaning.title: Laser Cleaning and Machining
laserCleaning.description: We provide modern laser cleaning and machining technologies, primarily for metal materials, but also for a wide range of other surfaces.

solarTech.title: Solar Technology and E-mobility
solarTech.description: We offer innovative solutions for carports, increasing solar panel efficiency, and advanced electronics for electric vehicle charging.

innovation.title: Innovation and Development
innovation.description: We continuously push the boundaries of possibilities in robotics and laser technologies.

customSolutions.title: Custom Solutions
customSolutions.description: We tailor each project to specific customer needs and deliver technologies that exceed their expectations.

partnership.title: Tailored Partnership
partnership.description: We are with you every step of the way – from initial design to final installation and subsequent service. We offer a personal approach you can rely on.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Find out how our technologies can help you optimize production processes and increase the efficiency of your operations. We are ready to be your partner on the journey to modern manufacturing.
